text: The Ogdensburg Bridge and Port Authority owns two segments of shortline railroad that are operated by a private contractor dba the New York and Ogdensburg Railway . This railroad serves the Port of Ogdensburg and connects with CSX Transportation, thus providing intermodal service for industries of northern and central New York, as well as southeastern Ontario, Canada. ==External links== * NY&O; information page * Official Site Category:New York (state) railroads Category:Companies operating former Rutland Railroad lines
